Look for the best in people.
Expect the worst, but look for the best.
I'm not one to look back, but this has made me do so,...
...and I think of my folks taking me to the drive-in...
...to see Butch and Sundance and loading up my car and moving out here,...
...and Geena and Ridley giving me my first shot to all the wonderful people...
...I've met along the way to stand here now.
Once upon a time in Hollywood, I think that's the truth.
